```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("circle", fill = "#e4e4e4", height = "15px"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-circle", fill = "#428bca", height = "15px"))

wk_post <- tibble(
  

"Data Camp" = c(unchecked,
                checked,
                unchecked,
                unchecked,
                unchecked),

"eCampus" = c(unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked),

"R" = c(checked,
        checked,
        checked,
        checked,
        unchecked),

"Slack" = c(unchecked,
            unchecked, 
            unchecked, 
            checked,
            unchecked),

"To Do" = c("Take a look at a repository of various network commands an options in R",
            "Complete the *Intermediate R* module on Data Camp",
            "Watch and follow walkthroughs on communities and cliques",
            "Begin this week's network task that uses flight data^[Due in two weeks.]",
            "Schedule a one-on-one meeting with me for this or next week^[You can use the appointment calendar on the course website]"
            ),

Location = c("[Link](/readings/05-reading/#literature)",
             "[Link](https://www.datacamp.com/){target='_blank'}",
             "[Link](/materials/05-walkthrough/#snippets){target='_blank'}",
             "[Link](/tasks/05-tasks/#r-task)",
             "[Link](https://calendly.com/nopiecharts){target='_blank'}")
)
```
